articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Two European satellites launch on mission to blot out the Sun—for science - Ars Technica
articles.description: This will all happen nearly 40,000 miles above the Earth, so you won’t need your eclipse glasses.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Copilot Vision, Microsoft’s AI tool that can read your screen, launches in preview - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft's newest AI tool, Copilot Vision, can read your screen — or rather, the sites you're browsing with Edge. It's now in preview.
articles.content:
Microsoft’s AI can now read your screen or rather, the websites you’re browsing.
On Thursday, the company began rolling out a limited, U.S.-only preview of Copilot Vision, a tool that can understand… [+3152 chars]
